/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, a gas station stands out with its red and white sign, a common sight in urban landscapes. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and green dominating the palette, reflecting the city's blend of natural and man-made elements.
